abstract: Yuto Nagatomo (長友 佑都, Nagatomo Yūto, born 12 September 1986) is a Japanese footballer who plays as a defender for Serie A club Internazionale.
comment: Yuto Nagatomo (長友 佑都, Nagatomo Yūto, born 12 September 1986) is a Japanese footballer who plays as a defender for Serie A club Internazionale.
